reviews.text:
The food was just average. Nothing to rave about or make me want to come back. That said, I have to give credit where it‚Äôs due‚Äîthe service was attentive and pleasant, which made the experience better.

Here‚Äôs what I ordered:
-The Full Monty: A decent plate, but nothing particularly exciting. For the price, I expected a more generous portion or at least something that stood out flavor-wise. It checked the boxes but didn‚Äôt leave an impression. (Rating: 2.5/5)
-Breakfast Sandwich: A standard sandwich with an odd flavor combination. The sweet tomato relish, paired with cucumbers, just didn‚Äôt work for me. The sweetness threw off the balance and made the whole thing feel underwhelming. Definitely not something I‚Äôd order again. (Rating: 2/5)

Overall, while the service was commendable, the food didn‚Äôt justify the price or the visit. Not terrible, just forgettable.

I absolutely love the ambiance and coffee here. The single-shot oat milk latte is a must-try. Sitting at the counter bar for breakfast was a special experience, surrounded by the rich aroma of freshly brewed coffee. This pet-friendly caf√© can get quite busy in the morning, so it‚Äôs best to reserve a spot in advance.

Had an amazing lunch a while back and I‚Äôm still thinking about when I can next try the rest of their menu.

The Sandwich Special was light and refreshing! While I did enjoy the Beastly Girl burger, it was moreish and I don‚Äôt imagine I could finish the whole thing on my own as the flavours were super full on. But the sandwich, I could polish off easily! It was too good! Excited to see what‚Äôs next on their seasonal menu.

The Halloumi Spinach Salad was pretty tasty. Happy that they grilled the halloumi. Flavours and textures blended well. I especially loved the roasted peppers!!

Will be back for sure!

The music, ambience, wonderful caramelised onion smell and waves of coffee smell that just swings into your nostrils - we totally love the space and the food! The sandwiches were done really nicely (fresh veggies, nice homemade pestos that just accentuated everything, love the aged cheddar and the surprise in flavours - I think mine even had a ËÄÅÂπ≤Â¶à chili oil flavour somewhere hahaha). The portions left us filling satiated at just the right amount and the chips were definitely light and crisp! ü•™

For drinks and dessert, coffee was great and you can see people dropping by just to order coffee for take-out. I had the hot chocolate and it was tantalisingly rich, warm and frothy!‚òïÔ∏è the churros were soooo crispy on the outside with such a generous sprinkling of cinnamon sugar and a lovely chocolate sea salt dip! Everything was just done with so much heart! ü•∞ü•∞üíñüíñ

Would definitely recommend everyone to drop by for the wonderful food and inclusive experience and environment! üòçüòç

A Hidden Gem Sandwich Bar

This sandwich bar is a hidden gem! üíé The atmosphere is cozy with great music, and the ingredients were fresh and delicious. The staff is incredibly friendly and attentive, making my visit enjoyable. There‚Äôs even an option to create your own breakfast platter, as well as a variety of lunch options. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a fantastic sandwich experience!
